episodes.title: Once Upon A Crime with Keshav Dass - Episode 3 : The Krugersdorp Cult Murders
episodes.description:
Please be advised: Once Upon a Crime is a series depicting true crime incidents in South Africa. The content may not be suitable for sensitive viewers. Viewer discretion is advised. The views and opinions expressed during Once Upon a Crime is not that of the SABC & Lotus FM.

Episode 3 of Once Upon A Crime takes a dive into the dark underbelly of Krugersdorp, where a seemingly ordinary woman, Cecilia Steyn, spun a web of manipulation, deceit, and murder. Join host, Keshav Dass along with guest Nicole Engelbrecht as they unravel the story of Cecilia Steyn.  How did this woman turn ordinary people into killers? And what dark secrets are still buried.
